menuItems.name: Pancakes
menuItems.description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and butter.

menuItems.name: French Toast
menuItems.description: Thick slices of bread dipped in a mixture of eggs and milk, then fried until golden brown.

menuItems.name: Omelette
menuItems.description: Fluffy omelette filled with your choice of ingredients.

menuItems.name: Fried Rice
menuItems.description: Classic fried rice with eggs, green peas, carrots, and green onions, seasoned with soy sauce and sesame oil.

menuItems.name: Chicken Parmesan
menuItems.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella, served over spaghetti.

menuItems.name: Caesar Salad
menuItems.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing with croutons and shaved Parmesan cheese.

menuItems.name: Margherita Pizza
menuItems.description: Classic Margherita pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil on a thin crust.
